sentences.en: He is ancient and shriveled appearance and is the semi - transparent, pearly - white color of a typical ghost.
sentences.cn: 他年纪非常老了,皮皱得厉害,和典型的幽灵一样,他是半透明, 纯白色的.

sentences.en: Her soul arrived up in heaven where she was met Pearly Gates by St. Peter himself.
sentences.cn: 她的灵魂来到了天堂,在那儿她遇到了看守天国之门的圣徒彼得.

sentences.en: Pearly curtains of frozen dews , ho , beds and tables of crystalline frost.

sentences.en: The corona is a brilliant, pearly white, filmy light, about as bright as the full Moon.
sentences.cn: 光环带是一种灿烂的珠白色朦胧光, 几乎像满月一样明亮.

sentences.en: The wave lashed against the rocks, sending up pearly spray.
sentences.cn: 海浪冲击着礁石, 飞起像珠子般的水花.

sentences.en: Three guys died and when they get to the pearly gates, St. Peter meets them there.
sentences.cn: 三个家伙死后到达天堂之门, 圣彼得在那儿招见他们.

sentences.en: Three nuns died and visited St. Peter pearly gates.
sentences.cn: 三个修女死了,来到彼得大帝门前.
